1.0.name: wordpress/auto-delete-posts
1.0.description:
The Auto Delete Posts plugin can be used to delete all posts after an expiration date has elapsed. It is also possible to move all posts to a single category after expiration. Disabling the plugin will provide a preview of posts that will be deleted or moved.

Note: Please read the installation instructions for latest changes
